SEARCH

Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service

package cdx.opencdx.commons.service
This is the Service Interface package, designed specifically for defining Spring service interfaces.

The files housed within this package are typically of the Interface type. The corresponding implementations of these interfaces are located in the adjoining 'impl' package.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl
    This package is dedicated to the concrete implementation of Spring Service Interfaces.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    OpenCDXAuditService
    The OpenCDXAuditService interface provides methods for recording various audit events.
    OpenCDXClassificationMessageService
    OpenCDXClassificationMessageService is an interface that defines methods for submitting a questionnaire and a connected test for classification.
    OpenCDXCommunicationService
    The OpenCDXCommunicationService interface provides methods to send notifications to the opencdx-communication system.
    OpenCDXCurrentUser
    The OpenCDXCurrentUser interface defines methods to manage the current authenticated user.
    OpenCDXDocumentValidator
    OpenCDXDocumentValidator is an interface that defines methods to validate the existence of documents in a collection or repository.
    OpenCDXHtmlSanitizer
    OpenCDXHtmlSanitizer interface offers capabilities to cleanse HTML content.
    OpenCDXMessageService
    The OpenCDXMessageService interface provides methods for subscribing to message subjects, unsubscribing from message subjects, and sending messages.
    OpenCDXNationalHealthIdentifier
    The OpenCDXNationalHealthIdentifier interface serves as a blueprint for creating National Health ID for users in the OpenCDX system.
